SELECT * FROM product where 1=1
AND p_category = 'outer'
AND p_category = 'top'
AND p_category = 'shirt'
AND p_category = 'pants'
AND p_category = 'acc'
AND 2=2
AND p_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER by
p_insert_date DESC
p_buy_amount DESC
p_price DESC
p_price ASC
p_insert_date DESC
LIMIT #{po}, #{ps}
SELECT z.zzim_no ,z.member_no , z.product_no , p.p_name , p.p_price , p.p_img FROM zzim z , product p WHERE z.product_no = p.product_no AND z.member_no = #{member_no};
SELECT p_name , p_img FROM navi n , product p WHERE n.product_no = p.product_no AND n.insertDate > CURRENT_DATE() AND n.member_no = #{member_no} GROUP BY n.product_no ORDER BY n.insertDate DESC;
SELECT q.qa_no , q.member_no , q.qa_title , q.qa_content , q.qa_insertDate , q.qa_answer , m.name FROM qa q , member m WHERE q.member_no = m.member_no ORDER BY q.qa_insertDate DESC LIMIT #{po}, #{ps}
SELECT q.qa_no , q.member_no , q.qa_title , q.qa_content , q.qa_insertDate , q.qa_answer , m.name FROM qa q , member m WHERE q.member_no = m.member_no AND q.qa_no = #{qa_no}
SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_insertDate DESC LIMIT #{po}, #{ps}

SELECT p.purchase_no , p.product_no , p.member_no , p.quantity , p.p_option , pd.p_img , pd.p_name , pd.p_price FROM purchase p , product pd WHERE p.product_no = pd.product_no AND member_no = #{member_no}
